front.title: IEC/ISO/IEEE Utility Connections in Port--Part 1: High Voltage Shore Connection (HVSC) Systems--General requirements

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: This paper is the international standard IEC/ISO/IEEE 80005-1. The intention of this standard is to define requirements that support, with the application of suitable operating practices, efficiency and safety of connections by compliant ships to compliant high-voltage shore power supplies through a compatible shore to ship connection.
